structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Persons required to complete examinations under KRS 186.480.
law.text:
The following persons shall be required to successfully complete the examinations required under KRS 186.480 prior to being issued a Kentucky operator's license:
A person who has been issued a Kentucky instruction permit or intermediate license;
A person who has applied for a Kentucky operator's license under KRS 186.412(4); and
Other persons as identified in an administrative regulation promulgated by the Department of Kentucky State Police under KRS Chapter 13A.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 200, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2002.
